short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to change news headlines for more accurate and less clickbaity content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of being tricked by misleading headlines? Or maybe you’re looking for a little fun with your news? No More Clickbait is the Chrome extension that not only removes clickbait but also gives you the option to add some humor or dramatic flair to headlines.

Key Features:

Clickbait Removal: Automatically removes exaggerated, misleading headlines and replaces them with accurate, clear titles that reflect the true content of the article.
Clickbait Creation: Want to have some fun? Flip the script and turn regular headlines into more sensationalized, dramatic, or humorous ones—perfect for a little satirical twist!
Satirical Headlines: Add a fun, cheeky spin to news articles. Whether it’s for a laugh or a social media post, you can make headlines that poke fun at the news.
Customizable Filters: Whether you prefer a totally clickbait-free feed or want to mix in some creative, over-the-top headlines, you can tailor the extension to your exact tastes.
Seamless Integration: Works with major news websites in real-time, automatically filtering or modifying headlines based on your preferences.
Why Install No More Clickbait?

Get Accurate News: Save time and get straight to the point with headlines that are truthful and to the point, no more wasting clicks on misleading articles.
Have Some Fun: Unleash your inner journalist with the option to make headlines more clickbaity or satirical—perfect for sharing laughs with friends or adding a creative twist to the news.
Enhanced Browsing: Whether you’re looking for straightforward info or a humorous take on current events, No More Clickbait has you covered.
Transform your news feed into something smarter or more entertaining! Install No More Clickbait today and decide what your headlines should really say!
